Chris Valentino is a brand strategist and visual storyteller.

Chris has an award winning history in film, television and the web. His directing credits include the documentary film INNERSTATE, NewWay RA with Deborah Norville, Fit in Your Skin with Jackie Warner, Showtimeâ€™s: Vargas V Mayorga: Countdown to the Brawl, numerous television pilots, show opens, music videos and consumer marketing campaigns.

In 2008, Chris co-founded Motive NYC to provide creative solutions across all media platforms with a strong focus on the growth and development of emerging technologies and communications. Combining creative, strategy and passion Motive is focused on offering full service solutions for brands, businesses and people alike.
